English: Tanggu former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district `濱海~`新~`區~|滨`海~`新~区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]

d.f: `城市~`名~。`位於~`河北省~`寧~`河~`縣~`南方~，`與~`大沽~`相對~。`是~`天津~`的~`外港~，`濱~`臨~`渤海~，`有~`北寧鐵路~`經過~，`水陸~`交通~`便利~。

Deutsch: 2. früher gewöhnlich Tongku geschrieben (Ort in Nordchina)
English: Tanggu former district of Tianjin, now part of Binhai subprovincial district `濱海~`新~`區~|滨`海~`新~区[Bin1 hai3 xin1 qu1]
